channel.title: Desktop Countdown Widget
channel.description:
I've knocked up a quick [b]Rainmeter[/b] widget that shows a countdown to the release, if anyone wants it.
Edit : Last one, I promise :wink: :
[img]https://homepages.nildram.co.uk/~gweb2006/Resized_75_BM_Widget_Thumb_3.jpg[/img]
Download : [url='https://www.mediafire.com/?7u874397z184j01']https://www.mediafire.com/?7u874397z184j01[/url]
Edit : A different version, no Greenlight counter, random backgrounds :
[img]https://homepages.nildram.co.uk/~gweb2006/BM_Widget_Thumb_2.jpg[/img]
To change the timezone, see the Instruction vid : [url='https://youtu.be/fZ0-J3Duf0E']https://youtu.be/fZ0-J3Duf0E[/url] Download : [url='https://www.mediafire.com/?niibkz4mi9przgx']https://www.mediafire.com/?niibkz4mi9przgx[/url]
The old version :
[img]https://homepages.nildram.co.uk/~gweb2006/BM_Widget_Thumb.png[/img]
Grab the widget from here : [url='https://www.mediafire.com/?dqk987a9k4d1kob']https://www.mediafire.com/?dqk987a9k4d1kob[/url]
Instructional vid, if you don't have Rainmeter installed already : [url='https://youtu.be/fZ0-J3Duf0E']https://youtu.be/fZ0-J3Duf0E[/url]
Enjoy.
Edit : Updated to v1.1 ( I didn't check what would happen when the countdown reached zero :facepalm: - fixed )
Edit : Updated to v1.2 - Now only displays the highest percentage from Greenlight, and stores it for next restart. Download : [url='https://www.mediafire.com/?4c3co694o9fyxkp']https://www.mediafire.com/?4c3co694o9fyxkp[/url]

item.title: Desktop Countdown Widget
item.dc:creator: GalaxySwift
item.description:
Nintyuk:

How may I ask? Because I couldn’t pin down what actually grabs the percentage.

Edit: I just changed the error message to 100 instead of N/A, a in-elegant solution but a functional one.

Not sure if you still need this, but:
Right click the skin > Edit Skin > Scroll down to the “[Variables]” section > edit the value of “Percentage” to be “100” > save the document > right click the skin > Refresh skin

Read full topic

item.title: Desktop Countdown Widget
item.dc:creator: Nintyuk
item.description:
GalaxySwift:

On mine, I just manually changed it to say “100%”.

Oh, and I found another small problem: The countdown timer does not take timezones into account. My timer was a few hours off from the one on the site. It wasn’t difficult for me to fix, though.

How may I ask? Because I couldn’t pin down what actually grabs the percentage.

Edit: I just changed the error message to 100 instead of N/A, a in-elegant solution but a functional one.

Read full topic

item.title: Desktop Countdown Widget
item.dc:creator: GalaxySwift
item.description:
Nintyuk:

Do you want to do a updated one for just the countdown now that we have Greenlit status?

On mine, I just manually changed it to say “100%”.

Oh, and I found another small problem: The countdown timer does not take timezones into account. My timer was a few hours off from the one on the site. It wasn’t difficult for me to fix, though.

Read full topic

item.title: Desktop Countdown Widget
item.dc:creator: Stixxy
item.description:
Thank you, it looks great! What about what I had said about a possible fix for the Greenlight percentage? Would that work?

Already fixed, it now stores the highest percentage as well - so the next time you start the skin it won’t start with the lower percentage.

item.title: Desktop Countdown Widget
item.dc:creator: GalaxySwift
item.description:
I would love to have this on my Black Mesa themed desktop, but it doesn’t go with my it at all. Would it be possible to create a more minimal-styled one? Perhaps one that reads in a way so as it seems like you are an employee at Black Mesa (to match my wallpaper) like this: https://i.imgur.com/SdVDW.png
I shopped that onto a screenshot of my desktop to see if it’d look good: https://i.imgur.com/TuTTN.png

Also, to fix the Greenlight percentage thing, would it be possible to code it so that it will check if value of the percentage is lower that the current one, and if it is it won’t update it? Just an idea, not sure if that’s possible in rainmeter.

Read full topic
